00055 #ifndef _DEFS_H
00056 #define _DEFS_H
00057 
00058 #include <string>
00059 #include <vector>
00060 #include <orbitals.H>
00061 
00062 
00063 /* when matching ligand interaction centers onto template points, the
00064    matching for the hydrophobic points has to be less exact, h-bond
00065    point matchings are weight 1.0 during the DME, the least-squares-fit,
00066    and RMSD computations, this value is the relative weight for the
00067    hydrophobic points */
00068 #define  HPHOB_MATCH_WEIGHT              0.3
00069 
00070 /* maximal distance between atom centers when checking for hydro-compl */
00071 #define  HYDRO_DIST                      4.5
00072 
00073 /* maximal distance to look for polar ligand atoms for interface target
00074    atoms */
00075 #define  HPHIL_MATCH_DIST                5.0
00076 
00077 /* the range of donor acceptor distances in which a H-bond can be formed */
00078 #define  MIN_HBOND_LENGTH_HYDROGEN       1.5
00079 #define  MIN_HBOND_LENGTH                2.5
00080 #define  MAX_HBOND_LENGTH                3.5
00081 
00082 typedef enum{
00083   NONE=0,
00084   TRIANGLE_MATCH,
00085   DME,
00086   RMS_DEVI,
00087   VEC_DOT_PROD
00088 }errorType;
00089 
00090 #define  SMALL_FLOAT  1.0e-5
00091 #define  SMALL_DOUBLE 1.0e-10
00092 
00093 typedef enum atom_level_enum{
00094   UNKOWN_LEVEL = 0,
00095   ALPHA,
00096   BETA,
00097   GAMMA,
00098   DELTA,
00099   EPSILON,
00100   ZETA,
00101   ETA,
00102   LEVEL_ENUM_END
00103 }atom_level_type;
00104 
00105 #endif
